description: Table by antidiagonals T(n,k) of number of partitions of k where the largest part is less than or equal to n and where there are no more than two of any particular sized part.
formula: T(n, k)=T(n-1, k)+T(n-1, n-k)+T(n-1, n-2k) [with T(0, 0)=1 and T(n, k)=0 if n or k are negative].
author: _Henry Bottomley_, Apr 20 2001
